action.content:
Write a funny article about why the dinosaurs went extinct and put double quotations marks around your whole response. Include exactly 8 bullet points in your response. The bullet points should be in the form of:
* This is bullet 1
* This is bullet 2
...
action.label: context

action.content: "* The dinosaurs went extinct because they couldn't handle the 'heat' of the competition from the up-and-coming mammals.* They were too busy 'roaring' to notice the changing climate.* 'Dino-naps' were a common practice, but they missed the memo on asteroid avoidance.* Perhaps they were too 't-rex'ed out to adapt.* The last dinosaur dinner party was a'mass extinction' event no one RSVP'd for.* They were all too busy'stegosaurus-styling' to notice the impending doom.* And finally, the dinosaurs just couldn't keep up with the 'evolutionary pace' set by the new kids on the block.* So, in the end, it was a 'fossil' record of a party no one attended."<|end_of_text|>
action.label: response
